forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle after 5pm. Sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 7 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Drizzle then Mostly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle before 11pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 54. West southwest wind 7 to 12 mph.

weather_report:
As the sun casts its warm glow upon Downtown San Francisco this morning, a light breeze carries an inviting whisper of summer. The forecast hints at a high of 64 degrees, encouraging the city to shake off its overnight coolness. Yet, the tranquility belies the subtle dance of nature, with the possibility of drizzle linger after 5 PM and a few ominous clouds brewing. In the distance, the golden allure of the Golden Gate Bridge may flirt with wisps of fog, but currently, the clarity offers an unobstructed view—perfect for those with a penchant for exploration.

Today presents a delightful treat for lighthearted outings. These conditions dance delicately between the thin lines of warmth and chill, making layers a worthy choice. A lightweight jacket paired with a breathable top will serve well for both sunny strolls and the drafts that caress the bay. With such a splendid tableau set before us, one might consider a leisurely walk among the parks, a visit to a cozy café for a warm drink, or perusing the enchanting nooks of local shops. The charm of this city beckons, drawing residents and visitors alike to savor its allure while it lasts.
